title: Which college should I prefer for s BASLP course other than AIISH and AYJNIHH? I could not apply for these two before the last date. - Quora
tags: Bachelors in Audiology and Speech Language Pathology

response.answer_text: Manipal university It’s pretty expensive there, but you can get good case load There are two collages, one at manipal, Udupi district Karnataka and another is in mangalore district Karnataka. IISH Bangalore Indian institute of speech and hearing is another option. There are many speech and hearing colleges, am not sure how is the quality at other institutes apart from those mentioned above
Manipal University, JSS institute of speech and hearing Mysore Samvad institute of speech and hearing Bangalore Chandrasekhar institute of speech and hearing Bangalore
